title: Alter Column Types Without Taking Tables Offline
description:
There are many reasons you might want to alter the schema of your database but in many databases, this process typically requires downtime. In CockroachDB, we have supported online schema changes since our first stable release,  and in v20.1, we added the ability to alter primary keyswhile in production without downtime. 
The elegant design of alter primary keys eliminates the reliance on locks so that you can continue to use tables even while they undergo schema changes.
